name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer with 10+ years of experience in full stack development and a robust proficiency in **AWS**, **Linux**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible**. Expert in utilizing **cloud platforms** for deploying scalable applications and applying Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices to streamline deployment processes. Skilled in ensuring application security and implementing automation practices that enhance operational efficiency. Proficient in **Bash**, **Python**, and other **scripting languages** for efficient development and deployment workflows.

Demonstrated expertise in **CI/CD** that guarantees the quality of software releases and utilizes **API security** measures to safeguard applications. Strong background in **cloud environments** and IAM for managing access and secrets management effectively. Exceptional collaboration and communication skills, with a proven ability to take ownership of projects and adapt to evolving requirements. Committed to applying critical thinking to solve complex problems and deliver innovative solutions in the realms of healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:

•	Utilized **Bash** scripting and **Python** for automating system tasks, significantly reducing manual effort and enhancing operational efficiency by **25%**.
•	Managed cloud security best practices, including API security and IAM roles, ensuring compliance with security standards and regulations.

•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance security measures while developing infrastructure for various cloud environments.
•	Engaged in kernel-level debugging and performance tuning on **Debian**, leading to improved system reliability and reduced downtime by **15%**.
•	Developed automated testing strategies across applications using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Postman**, ensuring comprehensive coverage of unit, integration, and E2E tests.
•	Utilized critical thinking and adaptability to troubleshoot complex networking issues, ensuring maximum uptime and seamless network operations.
•	Fostered collaboration and communication skills by leading projects, mentoring junior engineers, and driving an ownership mindset within the team.
